DOC.criteria: Overweight individual ( BMI > = 25.0 kg/m2 ) Breast cancer survivor complete chemotherapy and/or radiation therapy Stage 0III The ability physically able exercise ( e.g . walk moderate pace ) Agree random assignment either group Give inform consent participate study activity Accessible telephone Able read communicate English Pregnant intend become pregnant next year Recent ( past 6 month ) stroke myocardial infarction Severe uncontrolled mental illness
